title: Disconnection 90% of Games Please Help!
body: A week ago I started having problems with League of Legends when during games, any type of games it would randomly disconnect. Whether it be before the first wave of minions or after we have taken all inhibitors, it does not matter. I started having problems last Sunday night and have tried games every day since then and with no luck, I have completed games but only 10% of them. What happens is, my character will stop moving all together but sometimes minions will move, it will then show the "Attempting to reconnect" bar. I have tried exiting out of the game and joining back in but then I get stuck on the screen right before the game starts. I don't think its my internet's problem as I keep a steady ping of 30 or lower. I have tried closing everything besides League and still no dice. I have disabled and enabled peer to peer, I have deleted the game and re-downloaded it numerous times, and I have ran out of options. Please help if you have anything to try. Any and all options are greatly appreciated. Thank you so much!

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like you're experiencing packet loss and/or entire connection drop-offs to the gameservers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to confirm your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you're still having issues after working through those steps, we can take a look at your route to the servers. Let me know what happens.

I downloaded,  and ran as administrator, the hextech repair tool. Would those logs help? Also, I switched my DNS, used an Ethernet connection, those did not work. Then I ran the packet buffering test form this link http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/ and it really didn't say much. Thank you for the response and I'm sorry if this is frustrating as I am not that good with technology.

Since the connection guide didn't resolve your issue, I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attach those hextech logs to it. This will allow our tech specialists to dive into those logs and further assist in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thank you for your time and I surely will!
